mapper.insert: INSERT INTO campusLectureFile (fileId, lectureId, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES (campusLectureFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{lectureId}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename})
mapper.select: SELECT fileId, lectureId, saveFilename, originalFilename FROM campusLectureFile WHERE lectureId = #{lectureId} ORDER BY fileId
